data.name: Lockdown Lewd UP! ❤️ Hot 'n Healthy
data.detailed_description:
Your neighbor and favorite streamer Bunnyhop is sick...
Help her with a hot mug of her favorite tea! ❤️

Enjoy this little bonus episode for free!
Take care and stay funky!
Your Tailnut devs Dez & Oni

data.reviews:
“I thought quests are dead but apparently they just moved to different place =)”
AndrewApp

“The art style and vibe of this game are incredible. Absolutely a joy to play”
LetterAfterZ

“Thanks for another funky game!”
Valeriy Petrov

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ (6.1.7601) 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 4th Gen or similiar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 Display recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Lockdown Lewd UP! contains adult themes and content that is only suitable for certain ages. Characters are shown in frisky situations and there's frequent adult humor abound.

All depicted individuals are adults over the age of 21.
